original: Åkerhielm, Samuel Lars, friherre, generalmajor, Visby, f. 23i/10/87 i Sthlm av presid., frih. Lars A. o. Hulda Nyström. G. 13’ m. Margareta Reuterswärd, SLKSM. Barn: Ehsabeth f. 15, g. m. red. S. A. öström de Boussard. — AIHS 10-11, KHS ,13-15. Und:löjtn. v. Svea art:reg. 08, löjtn. 13, kapt. v. gen:staben 20, v. Svea art:reg. 26, åter v. gen ]Staben 28, major i gen :staben 29, lär. v. KHS 30, chef f. Norrb. art :-kår 3’1, överstelöjtn. 34, överste i armén 36 o. chef f. KHS 37, chef f. Svea art:reg. 40, stf. f. chef. f. försv:staben 41, stf. arm;éförd:chef v. H. förd. 41, gen :major o. mil :befälh. f. VH. milo tillika chef f. Gotl. marindistr. 42. Lär. i gen:stabstj. v. KHS 23-27 o. 28-31. Ordf. i Gotl. skarpskytte- o. jägargille sed. 46. KSOlkl, KFinlVRO, KTysk-ÖO, OffNedONO m sv, GV:s01M, CFBSM, LKrVA.
translated: Åkerhielm, Samuel Lars, Baron, Major General, Visby. Born on the 23rd of October 1887 in Stockholm, the son of President Lars A. Åkerhielm and Hulda Nyström. Married in 1913 to Margareta Reuterswärd, SLKSM. Children: Ehsabeth, born in 1915, married to editor S.A. Öström de Boussard. - Member of AIHS 1910-1911, KHS 1913-1915. Ensign in Svea Artillery Regiment in 1908, promoted to Lieutenant in 1913, Captain in the General Staff in 1920, back to Svea Artillery Regiment in 1926, back to the General Staff in 1928, Major in the General Staff in 1929, instructor at KHS in 1930, commander of Norrbotnian Artillery Corps in 1931, Lieutenant Colonel in 1934, Colonel in the Army in 1936 and Commander of KHS in 1937, Commander of Svea Artillery Regiment in 1940, Deputy Chief of the Defense Staff in 1941, Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces in 1941, Major General and Military Commander of VH. Military Region and Chief of Gotland Naval District in 1942. Instructor in General Staff Tactics at KHS from 1923-1927 and 1928-1931. Chairman of Gotland Sharpshooters and Hunter's Guild since 1946. Received KSOlkl, KFinlVRO, KTysk-ÖO, OffNedONO with sash, GV:s01M, CFBSM, and LKrVA.

employment.roleName: Deputy Chief of the Defense Staff
